description:
It does not open the first argument filename I pass. :(
the system command is also not 'tv' but '/snap/bin/codechenx-tv'

Would be nice to have it fixed )
My best regards

Just remember you need to run it in terminal. It readily uses all the screen available. Jumps fast at commands. The way out of the help screen is the "?" again. The only weakness that is serious enough to bother one much is the fact that a large field can be larger than the width of the screen and so not fully view-able.
summary: Does what is says, quit and simple
